lines.text: declare ints i , j , k , d , l , m and t with k , d , l , m and t = 0 , and int arrays A and B with n elements
loop i from 0 to n exclusive , read A [ i ] and B [ i ]
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> A [ i ] >> B [ i ] ; }

lines.text: loop i from 0 to n exclusive
loop j from 0 to n exclusive
if A [ i ] < A [ j ] and B [ i ] = B [ j ] , set d to 1
if A [ i ] > A [ j ] and B [ i ] = B [ j ] , set t to 1
if A [ i ] = A [ j ] and B [ i ] > B [ j ] , set k to 1
if A [ i ] = A [ j ] and B [ i ] < B [ j ] , set m to 1
if m = 1 and k = 1 and t = 1 and d = 1 , increment l

mod_code: int i , j , k , d , A [ n ] , B [ n ] , B [ n ] , B [ n ] , t = 0 , t = 0 ;
errors.err_msg: redeclaration of ‘int B [n]’
